document.heading: Homestead and Senior Citizen Real Property Tax Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-147, the “Homestead and Senior Citizen Real Property Tax Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-101, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 5, 2002, and April 9, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 24, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-325 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-147 became effective on June 25, 2002.
